name: One Last Job
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Criminal]] enemies in play (to a maximum of 4).
[cultist]: -2 (-4 instead if there is a [[Criminal]] enemy at your location).
[elder_thing]: -3. If you fail, discard the top 3 cards of the encounter deck. Choose 1 [[Criminal]] enemy discarded by this effect and spawn it engaged with you.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the number of [[Criminal]] enemies in play.
[cultist]: -3 (-5 instead if there is a [[Criminal]] enemy at your location).
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, discard the top 6 cards of the encounter deck. Choose 1 [[Criminal]] enemy discarded by this effect and spawn it engaged with you. It makes an immediate attack.

name: The Western Wall
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is your location's level.
[cultist]: -3. If you fail and your location is fully flooded, take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, increase the flood level of your location.
[elder_thing]: -3 (-5 instead if your location is fully flooded).
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 2 more than your location's level.
[cultist]: -5. If your location is fully flooded, take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -5. Increase the flood level of your location, if able.
[elder_thing]: -5 (If your location is fully flooded, you automatically fail instead).

name: Hunting Parasite
text: Aloof. Hunter. Prey - Bearer only. Spawn - A connecting location (empty if able). Forced - When the enemy phase ends: Place 1 doom on a player card at this enemy's location. Then, discard Hunting Parasite.

name: The Drowned Quarter
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of revealed locations (rounded down).
[cultist]: -2. If you fail and your location is fully flooded, take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -4. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.
[elder_thing]: -3 (-5 instead if your location is not flooded).
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of revealed locations.
[cultist]: -3. If your location is flooded, take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -4. For each point you fail by, place 1 of your clues on your location.
[elder_thing]: -4 (-6 instead if your location is not flooded).

name: Obsidian Relic [tdc_rune_y]
text:
If Obsidian Relic [tdc_rune_y] would leave play, remove it from the game.
[action]: Test [intellect] (8). Double the skill icons of each card committed to this skill test. If you succeed, flip this card and resolve its text.

name: Barrier Node
text:
Barrier Node cannot be defeated or leave play.
[reaction] When your turn begins: Heal 1 damage from Barrier Node.
[tdc_rune_q] · [tdc_rune_x] · [tdc_rune_g] · [tdc_rune_k] · [tdc_rune_s]
Barrier Node gets +2 health.

name: The Apiary
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the amount of doom on enemies and assets in play, rounded down (to a max of 4).
[cultist]: -1. If there is a [[Cultist]] enemy at your location, reveal another token.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, place 1 doom on an enemy at your location with no doom on it.
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, take 1 damage or 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the amount of doom on enemies and assets in play (to a max of 8).
[cultist]: -3. If there is a [[Cultist]] enemy at your location, reveal another token.
[tablet]: -5. If you fail, place 1 doom on an enemy at your location (with no doom on it, if able).
[elder_thing]: -6. If you fail, take 1 damage or 1 horror.

name: Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s]
text: If Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s] would leave play, set it aside, out of play. Forced - After you take 1 or more damage: Deal 1 damage to Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s]. [reaction] When you end the game with Ancient Relic [tdc_rune_s] under your control: Flip this card and resolve its text.

name: Grisly "Mask"
text:
[fast] Exhaust Grisly "Mask": Disengage from each enemy. Until the beginning of your next turn, you cannot move and cannot damage enemies or engage them.
[tdc_rune_j] · [tdc_rune_m] · [tdc_rune_s] · [tdc_rune_c] · [tdc_rune_b]
[fast] Take 1 direct horror and exhaust Grisly "Mask": Deal 2 damage to an enemy at your location.

name: Parasitic Transformation
text: Revelation - Put Parasitic Transformation into play in your threat area. Forced - After an enemy engages you: Place 1 doom on Parasitic Transformation. [action][action]: Discard Parasitic Transformation.

name: The Grand Vault
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of activated locations (rounded down).
[cultist]: -3. If you fail, you must either deactivate your location or take 1 damage or 1 horror.
[tablet]: -2 (-3 instead if your location is partially flooded; -4 instead if your location is fully flooded).
[elder_thing]: -4. If you fail, search the encounter discard pile for a copy of the Still Behind You treachery and add it to the victory display.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of activated locations.
[cultist]: -4. After this test resolves, you must either deactivate your location or take 1 damage and 1 horror.
[tablet]: -3 (-4 instead if your location is partially flooded; -5 instead if your location is fully flooded).
[elder_thing]: -5. If you fail, search the encounter discard pile for a copy of the Still Behind You treachery and draw it.

name: Tidal Tablet
text:
When your location's flood level is increased: Move to a connecting location.
[tdc_rune_l] · [tdc_rune_k] · [tdc_rune_d]
[fast] Exhaust Tidal Tablet: Increase the flood level of your location. Then, choose another flooded location and decrease its flood level.

name: Court of the Ancients
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the number of [[Glyph]] cards in the victory display.
[cultist]: -2 (-4 instead if there is a [[Stowaway]] enemy at your location).
[tablet]: -2. If your location is flooded, reveal another token.
[elder_thing]: -4. If this token is revealed during an attack or evasion attempt, take 1 damage or 1 horror.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 1 more than the number of [[Glyph]] cards in the victory display.
[cultist]: -3 (-5 instead if there is a [[Stowaway]] enemy at your location).
[tablet]: -3. If your location is flooded, reveal another token.
[elder_thing]: -5. If this token is revealed during an attack or evasion attempt, take 1 damage and 1 horror.

name: Shard of Y'ch'lecht
text:
You may ignore the first attack made against you by a [[Star Spawn]] or [[Deep One]] enemy each round.
[tdc_rune_b] · [tdc_rune_x] · [tdc_rune_o] · [tdc_rune_k]
[reaction] When a [[Star Spawn]] or [[Deep One]] enemy enters your location, exhaust this card: Exhaust that enemy.

name: Obsidian Canyons
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the current Storm Intensity.
[cultist]: -4. If this test fails, place 1 doom on the nearest enemy.
[tablet]: -1 for each open sky adjacent to your current location.
[elder_thing]: -2. If there is an enemy at your location, reveal another token.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 2 more than the current Storm Intensity.
[cultist]: -6. Place 1 doom on the nearest enemy.
[tablet]: -2 for each open sky adjacent to your current location.
[elder_thing]: -4. If there is an enemy at your location, reveal another token.

name: Sky Relic [tdc_rune_f]
text:
If Sky Relic [tdc_rune_f] would leave play, remove it from the game.
[action]: Test [agility] (8). Double the skill icons of each card committed to this skill test. If you succeed, flip this card and resolve its text.

name: Obsidian Claw
text: Cannot leave play. Enters play (Speed) side faceup. [fast] During your turn, exhaust this card and choose a location up to 2 connections away: Move to the chosen location. [tdc_rune_a] · [tdc_rune_p] · [tdc_rune_m] · [tdc_rune_e] · [tdc_rune_b] · [tdc_rune_c] [fast]: Flip this card. (Max once per round.)

name: Obsidian Claw
text: Cannot leave play. Enters play (Speed) side faceup. [action] Exhaust Obsidian Claw: Fight. You may use your [agility] instead of your [combat] and get +1 skill value for this attack. If the attacked enemy is exhausted, this attack deals +1 damage. [fast]: Flip this card. (Max once per round.)

name: Sepulchre of the Sleeper
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is the current Disturbance (to a maximum of 6).
[cultist]: -4. If you fail, draw the top card of the encounter deck. If you fail by 3 or more, that card gains peril and surge.
[tablet]: -4. For each point you fail by, you must either take 1 horror or discard 1 card from your hand.
[elder_thing]: -3. Reveal another token.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the current Disturbance.
[cultist]: -6. If you fail, draw the top card of the encounter deck. If you fail by 3 or more, that card gains peril and surge.
[tablet]: -6. For each point you fail by, you must either take 1 horror or discard 1 card from your hand.
[elder_thing]: -4. Reveal another token.

name: The Doom of Arkham Pt I
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is half the number of locations with no scenario cards beneath them (rounded up).
[cultist]: -3. If this test fails, place 1 doom on the nearest enemy with no doom on it.
[tablet]: -3. If this test fails, place 1 of your clues on your location.
[elder_thing]: -2. If your location is flooded, reveal another token.
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is the number of locations with no scenario cards beneath them.
[cultist]: -5. If this test fails, place 1 doom on the nearest enemy with no doom on it.
[tablet]: -5. If this test fails, place 1 of your clues on your location.
[elder_thing]: -4. If your location is flooded, reveal another token.

name: John Raymond Legrasse
text:
You get +1 skill value while fighting [[Deep One]] and [[Star Spawn]] enemies.
[reaction] During a skill test while fighting or evading Cthulhu, exhaust John Raymond Legrasse: You get +X skill value for this test, where X is Cthulhu's Rage.

name: Horror in Clay
text: Each [[Star Spawn]] enemy loses patrol and its printed Prey instructions and gains hunter and "Prey - You." [tdc_rune_u] · [tdc_rune_x] · [tdc_rune_o] · [tdc_rune_o] · [tdc_rune_d] · [tdc_rune_f] · [tdc_rune_z] [fast] Exhaust Horror in Clay: Either treat this asset's printed text box as if it were blank until the end of the round (except for Traits), or move a [[Star Spawn]] enemy once in any direction.

name: The Doom of Arkham Pt II
text:
Easy / Standard
[skull]: -X. X is Cthulhu's Rage.
[cultist]: -3. If you fail and your location is flooded, take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -3. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.
[elder_thing]: -1. Reveal another token. If you fail, after this test resolves, draw the top card of the Cthulhu deck. (Max one draw per round.)
back_text:
Hard / Expert
[skull]: -X. X is 2 more than Cthulhu's Rage.
[cultist]: -5. If your location is flooded, take 1 damage.
[tablet]: -5. If you fail, place 1 of your clues on your location.
[elder_thing]: -3. Reveal another token. If you fail, after this test resolves, draw the top card of the Cthulhu deck. (Max one draw per round.)

name: Stowaway Drone
text: Aloof. Patrol (nearest other enemy with no doom on it ). Forced - When the enemy phase ends: Place 1 doom on another non-[[Elite]] enemy at this location. Then, discard Stowaway Drone.

name: Infected!
text: Revelation - Put Infected! into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced - After you end your turn at a location with another investigator or a [[Stowaway]] enemy: Place 1 doom on Infected! [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you fail, take 1 damage. If you succeed, discard Infected!

flavor: "…the Great Old Ones spoke to the sensitive among them by moulding their dreams." - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Call of Cthulhu"
name: Pilgrim Acolyte
text: Forced - After Pilgrim Acolyte attacks: Place 1 doom on it.

name: Pilgrim Leader
text: Aloof. Spawn - Any location (empty, if able). While Pilgrim Leader is ready, each other [[Cultist]] enemy gets +2 fight and gains hunter and relentless.

name: Monstrous Star Spawn
text: Hunter. Massive. Relentless. Prey - Highest [combat]. Forced - When you reveal an [elder_thing] token while fighting or evading this enemy: Heal 1 damage from it.

name: Infected Star Spawn
text: Hunter. Relentless. Prey - Highest [agility]. Forced - The first time this enemy would be defeated: Heal all damage from it and ready it. Forced - When you reveal an [elder_thing] token while fighting or evading Infected Star Spawn: Take 1 horror.

name: Coral Star Spawn
text: Hunter. Relentless. Prey - Highest [willpower]. While Coral Star Spawn has damage on it, it gains alert and retaliate. Forced - When you reveal an [elder_thing] token while fighting or evading this enemy: Take 1 damage.

name: Star Spawn Observer
text: Aloof. Hunter. Prey - Highest [intellect]. Forced - When you reveal an [elder_thing] token while investigating Star Spawn Observer's location: It engages you and makes an immediate attack.

name: Eye of the Deep
text: Revelation - Put Eye of the Deep into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. Treat each [cultist] and [tablet] token you reveal during a skill test as if it were an [elder_thing] token, instead. [action]: Test [willpower] (3). If you succeed, discard Eye of the Deep.

name: Cunning Mimicry
text: Revelation - If there are no [[Monster]] enemies in play, Cunning Mimicry gains surge. Otherwise, test [intellect] (3). If you fail, the nearest [[Monster]] enemy attacks you (regardless of its current location).

name: Elder Mist
text: Revelation - Attach Elder Mist to the nearest location without Elder Mist attached. Each investigator at attached location gets -1 [willpower], -1 [intellect],-1 [combat], and -1 [agility]. Forced - After an investigator at attached location succeeds at a skill test by 2 or more: Discard Elder Mist.

name: Corrosive Fog
text: Revelation - Test [intellect] or [combat] (4). If you fail, take 1 damage. If you fail by 3 or more, instead deal 1 direct damage to your investigator and each [[Ally]] and [[Item]] asset you control with health.

name: Voltaic Eel
text: Hunter. Prey - Most clues. While Voltaic Eel is moving during the enemy phase, each fully flooded location is considered to be connected to one another.

name: Dreaming Migration
text: Revelation - If there are no enemies in play, Dreaming Migration gains surge. Otherwise, test [willpower] (3). If you fail, you must choose one: - The nearest enemy moves to your location and makes an immediate attack. - Draw the topmost enemy in the encounter discard pile.

name: Undersea Hunt
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (3). This test gets +2 difficulty if your location is fully flooded. If you fail, take 1 damage and increase the flood level of the nearest eligible location.

name: Deadly Torrent
text: Revelation - If your location is unflooded, Deadly Torrent gains surge. Otherwise, you must choose: - Test [agility] (4) to swim to safety. If you succeed, move to a connecting location. If you fail, take 1 damage and 1 horror. - Test [combat] (4) to stand your ground. If you fail, take 1 damage and discard 1 asset you control that takes up 1 or more slots.

flavor: "I cannot think of the deep sea without shuddering at the nameless things that may at this very moment be crawling and floundering on its slimy bed..." - H.P. Lovecraft, "Dagon"
name: Something in the Water
text: Surge. Revelation - Increase the flood level of the nearest eligible location.

name: Ominous Silence
text: Revelation - Put Ominous Silence into play in your threat area. As an additional cost to play a card, you must either spend 1 resource or take 1 horror. [action]: Test [agility] (3). If your location is not flooded, this test automatically succeeds. If you succeed, discard Ominous Silence.

flavor: "He had an unprecedented dream of great Cyclopean cities of titan blocks and sky-flung monoliths..." - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Call of Cthulhu"
name: Cyclopean Architecture
text: Revelation - Test [intellect] (X), where X is your location's printed shroud. For each point you fail by, choose and discard 1 card from your hand (to a maximum of 3).

flavor: "He said that the geometry of the dream-place he saw was abnormal, non-Euclidean, and loathsomely redolent of spheres and dimensions apart from ours." - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Call of Cthulhu"
name: Crumbling Masonry
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (X), where X is your location's printed shroud. If you fail, take 2 damage.

name: "Cthulhu fhtagn!"
text: Revelation - Test [combat] (3). If you fail, you must either take 2 horror or deal 1 direct damage to an investigator at your location.

flavor: "I have looked upon all the universe has to hold of horror, and even the skies of spring and flowers of summer must ever afterward be poison to me." - H.P. Lovecraft, "The Call of Cthulhu"
name: Oppressive Influence
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (X), where X is your location's printed shroud. If you fail, take 2 horror.

name: Domination
text: Peril. Revelation - You must decide (choose one): - Place 1 doom on the current agenda. This effect can cause the current agenda to advance. - Each investigator discards 2 cards from their hand. - Each investigator loses 1 action.

name: The Inescapable
text: Hunter. Relentless. Spawn - Any connecting location (empty, if able). Forced - The first time each round an [elder_thing] token is revealed from the chaos bag: Ready The Inescapable and resolve its hunter keyword (it does not attack).

name: Still Behind You
text: Revelation - Test [agility] (2). This test gets +1 difficulty for each copy of Still Behind You in the victory display. If you fail and The Inescapable... - ...is in play, it moves, one location at a time, to your location and engages you. - ...is not in play, search all in- and out-of-play areas for The Inescapable and draw it. Add Still Behind You in the victory display.

flavor: A hunter perfectly adapted to the lightless deep.
name: Deep One Thrall
text: Forced - After Deep One Thrall engages you: Discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Elder Deep One
text: Hunter. Retaliate. Each other [[Deep One]] enemy gains relentless. Forced - After Elder Deep One engages you: Heal 1 damage from each other [[Deep One]] enemy in play.

flavor: "Be careful out there. We have no idea what's lurking in the shadows."
name: Deep One Ambush
text: Revelation - Put Deep One Ambush into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. Forced - After a [[Deep One]] enemy engages you: It attacks you. Then, discard Deep One Ambush.

name: Tortured Visions
text: Revelation - Test [willpower] (3). This test gets +2 difficulty if you have 3 or fewer cards in your hand. If you fail, take 1 direct horror and discard 1 card at random from your hand.

name: Drawn to Darkness
text: Revelation - Put Drawn to Darkness into play in your threat area. Limit 1 per investigator. Your maximum hand size is reduced by 3 (to a minimum of 1). Forced - When your turn ends, if you have no cards in hand: Discard Drawn to Darkness.

name: Persistent Construct
text: Hunter. Prey - Nearest investigator with an [[Artifact]] asset. Forced - When you defeat this enemy: Spawn each other Persistent Construct in the victory display, exhausted, at your location.

name: Infernal Machinery
text: Revelation - Put Infernal Machinery into play in your threat area. You cannot trigger abilities on [[Glyph]] or [[Artifact]] cards. [action]: Test [intellect] or [agility] (4). If you succeed, discard Infernal Machinery.

name: No Place Like Home
text: Permanent. Uses (8 discoveries). Forced - When you reveal a location: Remove 1 discovery from No Place Like Home. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 1 [per_investigator] or fewer discoveries on No Place Like Home: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: No Place Like Home
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You may take an additional action during your turn, which may only be used to move.

name: Walk in Faith
text: Permanent. Uses (0 signs). [reaction] After an [elder_sign] token is revealed at any location: Place 1 sign on Walk in Faith. Forced - When the game ends, if there are more than 1 [per_investigator] signs on Walk in Faith: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Walk in Faith
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [willpower].
[reaction] After an [elder_sign] token is revealed at any location: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at that location.

name: Toe the Line
text: Permanent. Forced - When you take 1 or more damage: Place 1 damage on Toe the Line as well. Forced - When the game ends, if the amount of damage on this card equals or exceeds your maximum health: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Toe the Line
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [combat] and +2 maximum health.

name: Good Money
text: Permanent. [reaction] When you gain 1 or more resources: Place 1 of those resources on Good Money. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 5 or more resources on Good Money: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Good Money
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You begin the game with 5 additional resources.

name: Prove Your Worth
text: Permanent. Uses (4 chances). Forced - After you fail a skill test by 2 or more: Remove 1 chance from Prove Your Worth. Forced - When the game ends, if there are 1 or more chances on Prove Your Worth: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Prove Your Worth
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
Uses (3 chances).
[reaction] When a non-[auto_fail] token is revealed during a skill test at your location, spend 1 chance: Cancel that token.

name: Do No Harm
text: Permanent. Uses (5 obligations). [reaction] After you heal damage/horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset: Remove 1 obligation from Do No Harm. Forced - When the game ends, if there are no obligations on Do No Harm: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Do No Harm
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [agility].
[reaction] After you heal damage/horror from an investigator or [[Ally]] asset, exhaust Do No Harm: Gain 1 resource.

name: Dreams of Destruction
text: Permanent. Forced - When you take 1 or more horror: Place 1 horror on Dreams of Destruction as well. Forced - When the game ends, if the amount of horror on this card equals or exceeds your maximum sanity: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Dreams of Destruction
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You have 1 additional arcane slot and get +2 maximum sanity.

name: Plumb the Depths
text: Permanent. Uses (5 obsessions). Forced - After you discover the last remaining clue at your location: Remove 1 obsession from Plumb the Depths. Forced - When the game ends, if there are no obsessions on Plumb the Depths: In your Campaign Log, mark 1 progress under this Task.

name: Plumb the Depths
text:
Permanent. Unless this task has been completed, it enters play with its weakness side faceup.
You get +1 [intellect].
[reaction] After you discover the last clue at your location, exhaust Plumb the Depths: Draw 1 card.

name: Expedition Gear
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 damage from an investigator at your location.
[fast] Remove Expedition Gear from the game: Move a non-[[Elite]] enemy at your location or a connecting location once in any direction.

name: Laudanum
text:
Uses (3 supplies).
[action] Spend 1 supply: Heal 1 horror from an investigator at your location.
[reaction] When you draw a non-weakness [[Power]] or [[Terror]] treachery, remove Laudanum from the game: Cancel that treachery's revelation effect and discard it.

name: Alien Tablet
text:
Uses (4 secrets).
[fast] During a skill test on a [[Glyph]] or [[R'lyeh]] card, exhaust Alien Tablet and spend 1 secret: The performing investigator gets +2 skill value for this skill test.

name: Diving Suit
text: If your location is fully flooded, you may treat it as if it were partially flooded for the purposes of card effects. Forced - When any amount of damage would be placed on you: Place 1 of that damage on Diving Suit.

flavor: "Life's just one big score, and I plan to be the winner."
name: Ruby Standish
text:
You get +1 [agility].
[fast] If there are no ready enemies at your location, exhaust Ruby Standish: Move to a connecting location.

flavor: "I thought this story was gonna go in a very different direction."
name: Andy Van Nortwick
text:
You get +1 [intellect].
If your location has no clues on it, ignore the first attack of opportunity made against you each round.
